articles.title: How Weight-Loss Drugs Like Ozempic Will Alter the Stock Market's Outlook - Markets Insider
articles.description: The collective shedding of billions of pounds thanks to GLP-1 drugs is poised reshuffle trillions of dollars in the stock market and economy.
